column1: stasiun kereta;"train station";"Saya akan pergi ke stasiun kereta."; "I will go to the train station."; noun
stasiun televisi;"television station";"Ada berita penting di stasiun televisi malam ini."; "There is important news on the television station tonight."; noun
steker; "plug"; "Tolong colokkan steker ke sini.";"Please plug the plug in here."; noun
stepler; "stapler"; "Bisakah Anda meminjamkan stepler Anda?"; "Can you lend me your stapler?"; noun
stop kontak; "power outlet"; "Saya membutuhkan stop kontak tambahan untuk mengisi daya telepon saya."; "I need an additional power outlet to charge my phone."; noun
stroberi; "strawberry"; "Saya suka buah stroberi."; "I like strawberries."; noun
struk; "receipt"; "Tolong berikan struk pembayaran ini kepada saya."; "Please give me this payment receipt."; noun
Sudah lama tidak bertemu; "Long time no see"; "Sudah lama tidak bertemu. Bagaimana kabarmu?"; "Long time no see. How are you?"; sentence
suhu; "temperature"; "Suhu hari ini terlalu panas."; "Today's temperature is too hot."; noun
suhu badan; "body temperature"; "Saya harus memeriksa suhu badan saya sebelum bekerja."; "I need to check my body temperature before going to work."; noun
suite; "suite"; "Kami memesan suite mewah di hotel ini."; "We booked a luxurious suite in this hotel."; noun
sulit; "difficult"; "Pelajaran matematika sangat sulit."; "Math lessons are very difficult."; adjective
sumpit; "dart"; "Pergi mengambil sumpit untuk permainan kami nanti."; "Go get the darts for our game later."; noun
sungai; "river"; "Lihatlah keindahan sungai di pagi hari."; "Look at the beauty of the river in the morning."; noun
supir; "driver"; "Saya akan meminta supir taksi untuk menjemput kami nanti."; "I will ask the taxi driver to pick us up later."; noun
Surabaya; "Surabaya"; "Saya berasal dari Surabaya."; "I am from Surabaya."; noun
surat; "letter"; "Saya menerima surat dari teman saya di luar negeri."; "I received a letter from my friend abroad."; noun
Surat Ijin Mengemudi (SIM); "Driver's license"; "Anda harus memiliki Surat Ijin Mengemudi untuk mengendarai mobil."; "You need to have a driver's license to drive a car."; proper noun
surat kilat; "express mail"; "Saya akan mengirimkan surat kilat besok pagi."; "I will send the express mail tomorrow morning."; noun
suspens; "suspense"; "Film ini memiliki banyak adegan suspens."; "This movie has a lot of suspenseful scenes."; noun
